item.title: Microservices SDK
item.description: Microservices are server-side applications which may be used to extend the Cumulocity IoT platform with customer-specific functionality. The following Microservice SDK guide provides detailed information on the general concept and functionality of using microservices on top of Cumulocity how to develop and deploy microservices using C# how to develop and deploy microservices using Java how to use Cumulocity’s REST interfaces to develop microservices how to develop microservices using Python Detailed information on various topics related to microservices can also be found in the Reference guide:

item.title: Microservice SDK for C#
item.description: This section describes how to develop and deploy microservices on top of Cumulocity using the Microservice SDK for C#.

item.title: Using the REST interface
item.description: This section describes specific aspects of developing microservices using the REST interface.

item.title: Python example
item.description: This section shows you how to develop and deploy a microservice in Python that can be run on cumulocity.com, using Cumulocity Microservice SDK.
